bios.description: [BIOS] Nintendo Game Boy Color Boot ROM (World).gbc
Family Computer Disk System BIOS - Required for Famicom Disk System emulation
Game Genie add-on cartridge - Required for Game Genei Add-on emulation (Only supported on the fceumm core)
PS1 JP BIOS - Required for JP games
PS1 US BIOS - Required for US games
PS1 EU BIOS - Required for EU games

alternateNames: JVC Saturn, Hi-Saturn, Samsung Saturn, V-Saturn
Nintendo Super Famicom & Super Entertainment System
